posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have these 16 ungraded 1910 Obak 175 Subjects for sale. Paper loss on the reverse.

San Francisco: Henley, McCardle, Byrd, Willis, Melchior, Williams, Lewis, Mundorff, Browning & Mundorff.

Portland: Perrine, Ryan, Krapp, Steen & Fisher
Price: Your choice $15.00 each.

Shipping: $2.50

Payment: Paypal, check, or money order are all acceptable.

First response with a commitment to purchase gets the card(s).


Thanks for looking,

Joe
